customer_reviews.title: Misleading product description!
customer_reviews.text: The surface pro2 DOES NOT COME WITH THE TYPE COVER! - Every picture comes with the type cover. - The 'About this product' says 'Tablet portability, performance and laptop versatility with adjustable Kickstand and Signature Type Cover.* ' It's only when you get the product that you notice the '*' is for a 'legal disclaimer' that says '[*] Some accessories and software sold separately' Thanks for writing and displaying a misleading product description. I very likely would have selected a different product if I had know the type cover was not included.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for casual use.
customer_reviews.text: Paired with the official keyboard, this is an excellent laptop replacement. If you need a capable tablet that you can easily move files on and off of without having to deal with the problems of a “device OS” like Android or iOS, this is worth looking at. You’ll find this perfectly useful for light browsing, media streaming, or for use as a reader device. If you feel like you need something that can do intense multi-tab browsing on media-rich sites, video/photo editing, or drawing, you might want to check out the higher spec model of the Go 2, or even the higher models.

customer_reviews.title: Great device for casual tasks
customer_reviews.text: Coming from using apple products from day one. I couldn’t be more impressed this this device so far. I haven’t ran into any issues currently. I obviously wouldn’t recommend it to people that want to use it for super high performance tasks or use it for a long time doing them as the battery life is on the low end. But all in all I would recommend it to anyone that needs a device like this for casual tasks.

customer_reviews.title: Great for new frontier of online college courses
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I bought my Surface Go to do school work on. I’m a biology major, so I don’t require the amount of computing power that’s required for other areas of study. So far it has worked well as a monitor to type discussions, watch lectures, and fill in spreadsheets. It also works great as a tablet for when I have to hand write on worksheets, which is great because then I don’t have to print them. Overall, I’d say it suits my needs perfectly.
